eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.osm

Class OSMClassification

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.osm.OSMClassification

  • public class OSMClassification
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a YAML file with OSM tags and their correspondence to categories/subcategories, it creates a representation of a hierarchical classification scheme. LIMITATION: The resulting classification scheme is stored in an intermediate CSV file.
    Version:
    1.8
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

    • Field Summary

      private java.util.List<OSMFilter> filters 
      (package private) java.lang.String outputDir 
      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags

      Constructor of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String apply()
      Applies the user-specified filters over OSM tags and creates an intermediate CSV file with the resulting classification
      java.util.List<OSMFilter> getFilters()
      Return all filters that will be used to assign categories to OSM elements (nodes, ways, relations).
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTags()
      Return all OSM tags specifying the filters

    • Constructor Detail

      • OSMClassification

        public OSMClassification(java.lang.String classSpec,
                         java.lang.String outDir)
        Constructor of this class.
        Parameters:
        classSpec - Path to the YAML file containing the classification.
        outDir - Directory that will hold the intermediate representation of the classification scheme, as will be used during transformation.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public java.lang.String apply()
        Applies the user-specified filters over OSM tags and creates an intermediate CSV file with the resulting classification
        Returns:
        Path to the intermediate classification file, as will be used during transformation.

      • getTags

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTags()
        Return all OSM tags specifying the filters
        Returns:
        A collection of all OSM tags specified in the classification scheme.

      • getFilters

        public java.util.List<OSMFilter> getFilters()
        Return all filters that will be used to assign categories to OSM elements (nodes, ways, relations).
        Returns:
        A list with all specified filters, i.e., correspondence of OSM tags to user-specified categories.
